DOC.brief_summary: Examine effect three different dietary message dietary intake health parent child .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Three Different Dietary Messages Dietary Intake Health Families
DOC.detailed_description: The goal pilot study conduct randomize control trial examine three dietary message : increase fruit vegetable [ INCREASE ] , decrease energy-dense , non-nutrient dense snack food [ DECREASE ] , increase fruit vegetable plus decrease snack food [ INCREASE+DECREASE ] , within 6-month , family-based obesity prevention intervention . Each condition also focus increase family evening meal physical activity . Primary hypothesis : 1 ) INCREASE + DECREASE consume great ratio F & Vs : SFs INCREASE DECREASE 6 month . 2 ) INCREASE + DECREASE consume less energy INCREASE DECREASE 6 month .
DOC.criteria: Children age 612 year BMI percentile > 5th < 85th percentile age sex Have parent age > 21 year BMI > 25 Have overweight/obese parent willing attend intervention meeting Parent child speak read English Not move metropolitan area course investigation Reporting child parent plan participate dietary restriction relate fruit vegetable intake Physical activity restriction A parent reporting pregnant , plan become pregnant , currently breastfeed
